author: rhuijben
msg: Revert a pool usage change. This doesn't look valid even though
the call should use it as a scratch pool.
(Usually it doesn't fail any tests because the commit uses a lot of memory.)

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3054: PhraseQuery can in some cases stack overflow in SorterTemplate.quickSort(). This fix also adds an optimization to PhraseQuery as term with lower doc freq will also have less positions

author: rhuijben
msg: (svn_client_commit5): Use a scratch pool for performing the commit.
